    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void act​(float delta)
    Updates ships position Calculates the ships position based on the velocity and delta time If the ship moves inside a blocked tile, the ship is moved back to the previous position and the velocity is set to 0

    • act

      public void act​(float delta)
      Updates ships position Calculates the ships position based on the velocity and delta time If the ship moves inside a blocked tile, the ship is moved back to the previous position and the velocity is set to 0
